description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear conservatory); rear roof extension to provide habitable space; installation of rear dormer window; alteration to boundary wall; alteration to external elevations
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with submitted drawings: 1733/01 Location Plan and Existing and Proposed Site Plans, 1733/02 Existing & Proposed Floor Plans, 1733/03 P1 Existing & Proposed Front & Rear Elevations, 1733/07 P1 Existing & Proposed Front & Rear Elevations Showing Neighbours and Material Notes, 1733/08 P1 Dormer Details, Drawing 1 TYPICAL VERTICAL & HORIZONTAL SECTIONS, Drawing 2 TYPICAL VERTICAL CROSS SECTIONS OF PROPOSED CASEMENT WINDOWS, Drawing 3 TYPICAL HORIZONTAL CROSS SECTIONS OF PROPOSED CASEMENT WINDOWS, Drawing 4 BACK ELEVATION: EXISTING & PROPOSED TYPICAL FRENCH DOORS HORIZONTAL & VERTICAL CROSS SECTIONS, Design and Access Statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
